subject: history of modern tech founders and entrepreneurs
reason: to gain practical business-building knowledge for their own startup
onboarding_summary: The user is a founder who wants to study the history and strategies of modern tech entrepreneurs to apply those lessons to their own business.
focus_areas: fundraising, product-market fit, and practical tactical lessons from a wide variety of modern tech founders
skip_areas: deep biographical details unrelated to business strategy, pre-modern or non-tech industrial history
learner_context: The user is a current startup founder looking for actionable insights to apply to their own business immediately.
notes: The user prefers a broad survey of many founders rather than a deep dive into just one or two. They have minimal prior knowledge of tech history.
